description.value:
Your air elemental swirls around you with concealing gusts, making it harder for your foes to hit you and possibly giving you a moment to hide. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit with a Strike and deal damage to a creature in your air elemental's reach, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to that creature until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.UaUFJKZxEkN7yraC]{Effect: Air Elemental Support Benefit}
